amendment.description: To protect commercial aircraft from the threat of Man-Portable Air Defense Systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4976 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4976 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S9567-9574; text: CR S9570) To protect commercial aircraft from the threat of Man-Portable Air Defense Systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4976 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4976 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Boxer.
